targets.legendFormat: Messages published in the last minute
Publish failed message in the last minute
Messages acknowledged and published in the last minute
Messages not acknowledged published in the last minute
Unrouted published messages in the last minute
Messages consumed in the last minute
Messages acknowledged in the last minute
Messages rejected in the last minute

panels.description: The number of times Channel#basicPublish is called to send messages
panels.title: Published in the last minute

panels.description: Number of exceptions when calling Channel#basicPublish to send messages
panels.title: Publish failed in the last minute

panels.description: ack confirm events: messages handled successfully
panels.title: acknowledged published in the last minute

panels.description: nacks confirm events : messages lost by the broker
panels.title: Not acknowledged published in the last minute

panels.description: Number of callbacks (PublishReturn) when the message cannot find a route
panels.title: Unrouted published in the last minute

panels.description: The number of times Channel#basicGet is called to get messages
panels.title: consumed in the last minute

panels.description: The number of times Channel#basicAck is called to confirm consumption
panels.title: acknowledged in the last minute

panels.description: Number of failed consumption calls to Channel#basickNack|basicReject
panels.title: Rejected in the last minute (Nack + BasicReject)

list.description: The group to which the application belongs, usually the product line identifier, the application deployed in k8s is equivalent to namespace
list.label: Product Line
list.name: appGroup
